title: Quarkus Liquibase-MongoDB Extension is ignoring auth-mechanism and auth-mechanism-properties
body:
### Describe the bug

I am unable to connect to MongoDB Atlas hosted on AWS using quarkus liquibase-mongodb extension to create Collections and Indexes during the application startup.

we are trying to connect with below mentioned properties
```properties
quarkus.mongodb.credentials.auth-source=$external
quarkus.mongodb.credentials.auth-mechanism=MONGODB-AWS
quarkus.mongodb.credentials.password=<AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY>
quarkus.mongodb.credentials.username=<AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID>
quarkus.mongodb.credentials.auth-mechanism-properties.AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=<AWS_SESSION_TOKEN>
quarkus.mongodb.connection-string=mongodb+srv://<MONGO_DB_URL>?retryWrites=true&w=majority
```

https://www.mongodb.com/docs/manual/reference/connection-string/#mongodb-urioption-urioption.authMechanism

### Expected behavior

Quarkus mongodb properties must get considered and connection to mongodb atlas must be established

### Actual behavior

```posh
Wrong Auth-Mechanism is being used "SCRAM-SHA-1" instead of "MONGODB-AWS"

31-08-2023 18:37:12,942 [main] prozessid:  transaktionsid:  ERROR [io.quarkus.runtime.Application] Failed to start application (with profile [prod]): java.lang.RuntimeException: Failed to start quarkus
--
at io.quarkus.runner.ApplicationImpl.doStart(Unknown Source)

at io.quarkus.runtime.Quarkus.run(Quarkus.java:44)

The full response is {     "ok": 0,     "errmsg": "Unsupported mechanism 'SCRAM-SHA-1' on authentication database '$external'",     "code": 334,     "codeName": "MechanismUnavailable",     "$clusterTime": {         "clusterTime": {             "$timestamp": {                 "t": 1693499825,                 "i": 1             }         },         "signature": {             "hash": {                 "$binary": {                     "base64": "E6n2PfelrMfS1oe7+DJhM79ZGcc=",                     "subType": "00"                 }             },             "keyId": 7247132067840917508         }     },     "operationTime": {         "$timestamp": {             "t": 1693499825,             "i": 1         }     } }
at com.mongodb.internal.connection.ProtocolHelper.getCommandFailureException(ProtocolHelper.java:205)
at com.mongodb.internal.connection.InternalStreamConnection.receiveCommandMessageResponse(InternalStreamConnection.java:443)
at com.mongodb.internal.connection.InternalStreamConnection.sendAndReceive(InternalStreamConnection.java:365)

at com.mongodb.internal.connection.SaslAuthenticator.getNextSaslResponse(SaslAuthenticator.java:131)
... 49 more
```

### How to Reproduce?

Use quarkus mongodb properties and quakus-liquibase-mongodb extension with Mongodb Atlas 

```properties
quarkus.mongodb.credentials.auth-source=$external
quarkus.mongodb.credentials.auth-mechanism=MONGODB-AWS
quarkus.mongodb.credentials.password=<AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY>
quarkus.mongodb.credentials.username=<AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID>
quarkus.mongodb.credentials.auth-mechanism-properties.AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=<AWS_SESSION_TOKEN>
quarkus.mongodb.connection-string=mongodb+srv://<MONGO_DB_URL>?retryWrites=true&w=majority
quarkus.mongodb.database=<DatabaseName>
```

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

17

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.2.4.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Maven 3.8.6

### Additional information

_No response_
